entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow changing to snow at times heavy this evening. Blowing snow before morning. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 70 gusting to 100 before morning. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 70 km/h gusting to 100 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023
